20110113000006.000|20110113000007.000|CC1|POLICE FOR RUNNING A RED        
20110113000007.000|20110113000009.000|CC1|LIGHT JUST HOURS BEFORE HIS     
20110113000009.000|20110113000010.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION ATTEMPT OF        
20110113000010.000|20110113000012.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE         
20110113000012.000|20110113000013.000|CC1|GIFFORDS.                       
20110113000013.000|20110113000014.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO AUTHORITIES, IT    
20110113000014.000|20110113000016.000|CC1|WASN'T HIS FIRST RUN-IN WITH    
20110113000016.000|20110113000017.000|CC1|THE LAW.

20110113000019.000|20110113000021.000|CC1|SCHOOL SAYS ONE FORMER          
20110113000021.000|20110113000021.000|CC1|FRIEND.                         
20110113000021.000|20110113000023.000|CC1|>> TODAY AUTHORITIES

20110113000024.000|20110113000025.000|CC1|DETAILING LOUGHNER'S PAST

20110113000036.000|20110113000038.000|CC1|SCHOOL, HE WAS SENT TO THE
